name: Nymar Arisen
description:
The world of Nymar has been destroyed and rebuilt many times over. But this time, there is a new factor in this cosmic battle. One that might tip the scales against the endless horde. This new factor is you.

In Nymar Arisen, you take the role of an avatar of the creator. You have been sent to defend the world of Nymar from an endless army of demons who have destroyed the world multiple times before. To aid you in your task, the creator has given you control of the native antmen. On your command, they can automate many things such as resource gathering.

CURRENT FEATURES:

Riftgates-These structures will allow more powerful monsters to spawn in your world. They are harder to fight, but give better loot when defeated. There is one currently in game, the Wild Riftgate. More are planned.

Antmen-The natives of Nymar can be recruited and commanded to aid you. The only current job is Harvester, who can autonomously gather resources. Others are planned, like builder who can build structures and knights who will fight with you.

Creative Power-As an avatar of a god, you have access to magic in the form of Creative Power. You get it from crafting items, and can condense it into Creative Cores used for recipes like the Wild Riftgate and the Control Staff.

THIS GAME IS STILL BEING MADE, MORE FEATURES ARE PLANNED BUT NOT PRESENT IN THE CURRENT BUILD. THERE WILL BE FURTHER CONSTRUCTION AND UPDATES.
